#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType EquipmentList.

== Name ==

*[CEquipmentList EquipmentList]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--EquipmentList (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			List golf belongings of a player.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  ([CGolfClub golf-club] | [CEquipment equipment])`*` </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CEquipment golfml:Equipment] || [CEquipment equipment] ||  					Piece of golfing equipment owned by a player.				 ||
|| [CGolfClub golfml:GolfClub] || [CGolfClub golf-club] ||  					Golf club owned by a player.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CPlayer Player]
----
    <xs:complexType name="EquipmentList">  <xs:choice maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0">    <xs:element name="golf-club" type="golfml:GolfClub">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="equipment" type="golfml:Equipment">    </xs:element>  </xs:choice></xs:complexType>
----
